Name: Sweet Fart Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Smells like a powerful fart! Enables you to double-jump and travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride a Sweet Fart Mount that can double jump and move very quickly. Double-click the destination on the World Map to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. Buy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Smells like a powerful fart! Enables you to double-jump and travel very fast.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
